errors.friendly: Remember that you can't use "make" on the {0}.c file! Try running just "make {0}"
Make sure to declare '{1}' within scope before line {0}, and check that the variable is spelled correctly.

errors.actual: ^\w*.c:\d+:\d+: error: extra tokens at end of #include directive \[\-Werror,\-Wextra\-tokens\]\s*(.+)(.)\s*
